timeline.bodyText: Why does this need to be distinct? Is it an error if a user has duplicate validator keys?
timeline.author: jframe

replies.bodyText: I suspect it will wind up going through a map and becoming distinct naturally anyway, but running two instances of the same validator is the quickest and easiest way to get yourself slashed, so making sure keys are distinct is a really good idea.
replies.author: ajsutton
